name: df-made
body: |- wceq(cmade, crecs(cmpt(s0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(s0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))))))
comment: Define the made by function. This function carries an ordinal to all surreals made by sections of surreals older than it. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)
